metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28589 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper array index validation vulnerability exists in the LoadObj functionality of tinyobjloader v2.0-rc1 and tinyobjloader development commit 79d4421. A specially crafted file could lead to code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tinyobjloader package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
